name: Swyrm.stsi
description:
Simulation software recovered from a drone research lab orbiting a water world.

Unit is damaged and sometimes exhibits unusual behavior related to the first aural stimulation node.

-

Swyrm is a small interactive toy / screensaver meant to be enjoyed in the dark while relaxing.

Audio was created by @osavox and the soundtrack is on bandcamp:

Volyne - Swyrm

-

Controls:

Left / Right Click

Scroll Wheel

Left clicking red button terminates simulation
